scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:es && yarn build:cjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js  --ignore "**/*.test.js","**/test.js","**/*.test.ts","**/test.ts" --delete-dir-on-start
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js --ignore "**/*.test.js","**/test.js","**/*.test.ts","**/test.ts" --delete-dir-on-start
scripts.build:types: rimraf dist/types && tsc -p tsconfig.json -d --outDir dist/types  && rimraf dist/types/**/*.js
scripts.format: yarn format:src && yarn format:cjs && yarn format:es
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn format
scripts.validate: yarn check-types && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn format:src
